flawed_nl_solution:
Bush is younger than Matt by 3 years, so if Bush is 12 years old then Matt is 12+3 = <<12+3=51>>51 years old
In 10 years' time, Matt will be 10+51 = <<10+51=61>>61 years old
#### 61

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
